title: Set reminders and never miss a thing!
content:
Whether it’s an important report or a meeting with your customer, just set a reminder and move on with your day. When it’s time, Planyway will send you a push notification so you never miss out on tasks that matter.

Learn more

title: Group tasks by label on timeline
content: Build a clear roadmap for each type of work you are doing.

title: Advanced Checklists: a new way to get work done!
content:
Everyone loves task lists, right?

No doubt it’s a fantastic way to organize work and God bless this motivating feeling when you complete tasks once they’re done…

But we went much further and are happy to announce the Advanced Checklists!

title: Meet Weekly & Monthly views in Mobile apps
content:
Plan out your week or month in a visual manner anytime and anywhere right in your mobile.

Learn more

title: Meet Time tracking
content:
Track your team performance and see how much time your team spends on a given task or project.

Learn more

title: New: Connect your Google Calendar to Planyway
content:
Add your Google Calendar to Planyway to get an overview of your whole schedule. See and update Google Calendar events right in Planyway.

Learn more

title: New: Assign team members and dates to checklist items
content:
Assign team members and due dates to checklist items to make it clear who’s doing what and when it needs to be done. Checklist items with due dates will be shown as particular cards on a calendar, so you can manage your team’s workload.

Learn more

title: New: add detailed descriptions to Planyway cards
content:
Add links, details and important information to Planyway cards, and format them using simple Markdown syntax.

Learn more

title: Meet the weekly view in the Planyway iOS app
content:
Get an overview of your whole week to visualize what will be due on your busiest days.

Learn more
